channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The guy behind retirement’s 4% rule now thinks that’s way too low. Here’s how much more money you could spend.
item.description: Bill Bengen revised his formula and has a new “rule” for retirement investors.

item.title: Arrive AI obtains $40M for autonomous deliveries to smart mailboxes
item.description: Arrive AI has raised funding from investors and crowdfunding, started trading on the Nasdaq, and partnered to spread its delivery systems. The post Ar...

item.title: Spott’s AI-native recruiting platform scores $3.2M to end hiring software chaos
item.description: Spott secures $3.2 million in funding to build an all-in-one AI-native recruitment platform that automates workflows and eliminates tech fragmentation...

item.title: Abercrombie’s stock back in rally mode as outlook shows tariffs won’t hurt sales

item.title: Anthropic debuts Claude conversational voice mode on mobile that searches your Google Docs, Drive, Calendar
item.description: With the rollout of voice mode, Anthropic continues to broaden Claude's functionality and accessibility to all users.

item.title: The Download: the story of OpenAI, and making magnesium
item.description: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. OpenAI: The ...

item.title: Macy’s says it’s being ‘surgical’ with price hikes amid tariffs, will eat some costs
item.description: “We’re being incredibly surgical about the situation with tariffs,” said Macy’s Chief Financial Officer Adrian Mitchell.

item.title: GameStop makes its first bitcoin buy. Here’s why the stock is pulling back.

item.title: Rumi raises $4.7M to change passive media into interactive AI experiences
item.description: Rumi, an AI media company, has raised $4.7 million in a pre-seed funding round to transform passive media with rewards.

item.title: Ubitus, MacKay Memorial Hospital co-develop three medical robots
item.description: Ubitus used NVIDIA Omniverse and NVIDIA Isaac Sim to simulate hospital environments during the robotics project. The post Ubitus, MacKay Memorial Hosp...

item.title: Everyone’s looking to get in on vibe coding — and Google is no different with Stitch, its follow-up to Jules
item.description: Google is looking to compete in vibe coding with Stitch, which designs user interfaces (UIs) with one prompt.

item.title: How to afford retirement in America? Keep working.
item.description: Growing numbers of workers now plan to work part time in retirement, either because they want to, need to or both.

item.title: Akool Live Camera can translate video calls in real time, swap faces, and get live virtual avatars to mimic human movements
item.description: Akool Live Camera uses AI to capture human movement and mimic that movement with a generated virtual avatar in real time.

item.title: Veho and RIVR team up for wheeled, legged robot parcel delivery pilot
